Articles.Content:
Others have mentioned no-load control reversals before.  This is somewhat different in that I see the reversal on vehicles that are using more of a single wing style that uses elevons. 

My "trainer" spaceplane which is the first I built in this game has now become afflicted with this reversal on Patch 2.  It now has no roll control because of course that must be turned off when inverting the wing which is really another bug.  Luckily it retains just enough SAS control to effect roll.

Also the "roll animation" appears to be correct but the physics are what are reversed with it which can be particularly confusing.

Edited June 1, 2023 by Anth12
